MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the G34 postcode area of Glasgow. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 5:41pm. Our emergency response team have arrived at the Wardie Road substation and the team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 8:45pm. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 6:05pm on Saturday, 17 April 2021
